headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; Ocean Mail Service Contracts--Samuel W. Black Confirmed as Governor of Nebraska--The Tariff, &c. Speech of Senator Bigler on the Tariff Question. Visitation, Search and Burning of an American Vessel by a British Steamer on the Coast of Africa. IMPORTANT FROM WASHINGTON. ANOTHER "BRITISH OUTRAGE." THE OFFICIAL CORRESPONDENCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Navy Department is in receipt of official advices from the Coast of Africa, announcing tile visit, search, seizure and turning of an American vessel by a British cruiser. The follow wing correspondence, for which we are indebted to the courtesy of Secretary TOUCEY, tells the whole story: COMMANDER TOTTEN TO THE SECRETARY OF THE NAVY. UNITED STATES SHIP VINCENNES, Dec. 10, 1858.

headline.main: WASHINGTON SOCIETY.; WASHINGTON, Friday, Feb. 4, 1859. Personal Sketches and Glimpses of public Men at the Capital --Buchnan, Breckinridge, Houston, Jeff Davis, Brown, Binck, Floyd, Toucey, &c, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The best point in the moral atmosphere of this city. is the bracing and sharpening effect which it at once produces on the weakest and most diffident vision. Meeting a lion alone on his own mountain is one thing, and entering a menagerie full of muzzled lions is quit another.
